label: Gas smell
answerText: That could be serious. Please turn the system off, leave the area if needed, and call your gas company or 911. Want me to connect you to our on-call team?
followUpQuestion: Do you want me to connect you now?

label: CO alarm
answerText: That's urgent. Get everyone outside and call 911, then call the gas company. Do you want me to connect you to our on-call team?

label: Smoke from HVAC
answerText: Turn the system off right now. If there's active smoke or fire, call 911. Want me to connect you to our team immediately?

label: Sparks / arcing
answerText: Please shut the system off at the thermostat and breaker if safe. If it's actively sparking, call 911. Want me to connect you to our team now?

label: Electrical burning smell
answerText: That can be an electrical issue. Turn the system off for safety. Want me to connect you to our on-call team to get this handled fast?

label: Major water leak
answerText: Got it. Turn the system off to prevent more damage and, if possible, shut off the water source to the air handler area. Want me to get a tech out ASAP?

label: Shock / tingling
answerText: Stop touching the equipment and turn the system off at the breaker if it's safe. Want me to connect you to our on-call team right now?

label: Strong chemical odor
answerText: Understood. Turn the system off and ventilate the area. If anyone feels dizzy or sick, call 911. Want me to connect you to our team?

label: Hissing / refrigerant concern
answerText: That may be a refrigerant leak. Turn the system off and keep the area ventilated. Want me to schedule a technician today?

label: No cooling + vulnerable occupant
answerText: Got it. If anyone is overheating, prioritize safety and cooling them down right away. I can schedule the soonest available technician — want me to do that?

label: AC not cooling
answerText: Got it. I can help with that — we'll get a technician scheduled to diagnose it.
followUpQuestion: Do you want me to get that on the schedule?

label: Blowing warm
answerText: Understood. That's usually a quick diagnosis with gauges and airflow checks — I can schedule a tech.

label: AC won't turn on
answerText: Got it. We'll get a technician out to track down the power or control issue.

label: Short cycling
answerText: Thanks. Short cycling can strain the system — I can get a tech scheduled to fix it.
followUpQuestion: Do you want me to schedule that?

label: Frozen coil
answerText: Got it. Please turn the system off to let it thaw — I can schedule a tech to find the cause.

label: Weak airflow
answerText: Understood. Weak airflow is usually filter, blower, or duct related — I can schedule a tech.

label: No airflow
answerText: Got it. If there's no airflow, we'll want to check the blower and controls — I can get a tech scheduled.

label: Uneven cooling
answerText: Got it. Uneven cooling is usually airflow or duct balancing — I can schedule a technician to diagnose.
followUpQuestion: Do you want me to schedule it?

label: Runs nonstop
answerText: Understood. That can mean capacity, airflow, or refrigerant issues — I can get a tech out.

label: High bill
answerText: Got it. We can check efficiency, airflow, and system performance — want me to schedule a technician?

label: Not reaching set temp
answerText: Understood. That's a performance issue we can diagnose — I can schedule a tech.

label: Outside unit not running
answerText: Got it. That's usually electrical, capacitor, or control related — I can schedule a technician.

label: Fan not spinning
answerText: Understood. Turn the system off to prevent damage — I can schedule a tech to repair it.

label: Unit humming
answerText: Got it. Humming often points to a start component issue — I can schedule a technician.

label: Clicking / trying to start
answerText: Understood. That's a common electrical-start symptom — I can get a tech scheduled.

label: Buzzing noise
answerText: Got it. We can diagnose the source quickly — I can schedule a technician.

label: Rattling / banging
answerText: Understood. Noises can get worse fast — I can get a technician scheduled.

label: Screeching / squealing
answerText: Got it. That can be motor or belt related — I can schedule a technician.

label: Water around air handler
answerText: Got it. That's usually a condensate drain issue — I can schedule a tech to stop the leak.

label: Ceiling drip
answerText: Understood. Turn the system off to prevent more damage — I can schedule a technician.

label: Drain clogged
answerText: Got it. We can clear that and make sure it drains properly — want me to schedule service?

label: Float switch
answerText: Understood. That usually means the drain backed up — I can schedule a technician to clear it.

label: Musty smell
answerText: Got it. Odors are often moisture or growth in the system — I can schedule a tech to diagnose and recommend options.

label: High humidity
answerText: Understood. We can check airflow and dehumidification performance — want me to schedule a technician?

label: Thermostat cool but warm
answerText: Got it. That's a common control/performance issue — I can schedule a technician to diagnose.

label: No heat
answerText: Got it. I can schedule a technician to diagnose the heating issue.
followUpQuestion: Do you want me to schedule that?

label: Heat blowing cold
answerText: Understood. That's often thermostat, heat pump, or aux heat — I can schedule service.

label: Heat pump problem
answerText: Got it. Heat pumps need a quick diagnostic to pinpoint the cause — I can schedule a tech.

label: Aux / emergency heat
answerText: Understood. We can verify if that's normal or a fault — I can schedule a technician.

label: Defrost / icing
answerText: Got it. Some frosting can be normal, but heavy ice needs a check — want me to schedule service?

label: Furnace not working
answerText: Understood. We'll get a technician scheduled to diagnose the furnace.

label: Pilot light
answerText: Got it. We can check ignition and safety controls — I can schedule a technician.

label: Igniter issue
answerText: Understood. That's a common furnace repair — I can schedule service.

label: Flame sensor
answerText: Got it. That 'starts then stops' symptom is diagnosable fast — I can schedule a tech.

label: Heat short cycling
answerText: Understood. We can diagnose that before it causes damage — want me to schedule service?

label: Heat not reaching set temp
answerText: Got it. We'll check airflow, staging, and controls — I can schedule a technician.

label: Reversing valve
answerText: Understood. That's a heat pump component diagnosis — I can schedule a tech.

label: Strip heat
answerText: Got it. We can check the electrical heat staging — want me to schedule service?

label: Heat pump noise
answerText: Understood. We can pinpoint the source quickly — I can schedule a technician.

label: Heat won't start
answerText: Got it. I can schedule a technician to get your heat back on.

label: Drain backing up
answerText: Got it. We can clear the line and verify proper drainage — I can schedule a tech.

label: Drain pan overflowing
answerText: Understood. Turn the system off to prevent more water — want me to schedule a technician?

label: Dripping from vent
answerText: Got it. That can be drainage or insulation-related — I can schedule a technician.

label: Wet filter/return
answerText: Understood. That's usually a moisture/drain issue — I can get a tech scheduled.

label: Condensate clog
answerText: Got it. We can clear it and prevent repeat clogs — I can schedule service.

label: Float switch repeat
answerText: Understood. We'll clear the cause and test the safety shutoff — want me to schedule a technician?

label: Closet leak
answerText: Got it. I can schedule a tech to stop the leak and check the drain system.

label: Attic unit leaking
answerText: Understood. Attic leaks can damage ceilings fast — I can schedule a technician.

label: Rust/corrosion
answerText: Got it. We can inspect for ongoing moisture and prevent bigger damage — want me to schedule a tech?

label: Drain line cleaning request
answerText: Sure. We can take care of that as part of a visit — want me to get you on the schedule?

label: Thermostat not working
answerText: Got it. We can diagnose the thermostat and control wiring — I can schedule a tech.

label: Thermostat blank
answerText: Understood. That's usually power, batteries, or a safety switch — I can schedule a technician.

label: Thermostat batteries
answerText: Got it. If batteries don't fix it, we can diagnose the power/control side — want me to schedule a tech?

label: Breaker tripping
answerText: Understood. Please leave it off for safety — I can schedule a technician to diagnose the electrical issue.

label: Fuse blown
answerText: Got it. We'll need to find the cause before replacing repeatedly — I can schedule service.

label: No power to unit
answerText: Understood. We can check breaker, disconnect, and controls — I can schedule a technician.

label: Capacitor / contactor
answerText: Got it. That's a common repair — I can schedule a technician to confirm and replace if needed.

label: Control board
answerText: Understood. Boards need proper testing — I can schedule a tech to diagnose.

label: Low voltage / wiring
answerText: Got it. We can test the low-voltage circuit and controls — want me to schedule a tech?

label: Smart thermostat/app
answerText: Understood. We can troubleshoot the thermostat setup and verify the HVAC side — want me to schedule a visit?

label: Clicking no start
answerText: Got it. That's often a start/electrical issue — I can schedule a technician.

label: Disconnect box
answerText: Understood. We can check the disconnect and power feed safely — want me to schedule service?

label: Lightning/surge damage
answerText: Got it. Storm surges can knock out components — I can schedule a technician to diagnose.

label: Reset system
answerText: Understood. We can try quick checks, and if it still fails we'll schedule a technician.
followUpQuestion: Do you want me to schedule it if the quick checks don't work?

label: Error code
answerText: Got it. Error codes help narrow it down — I can schedule a tech to diagnose properly.

label: Low refrigerant
answerText: Got it. If it's low, there's usually a leak to find — I can schedule a technician.

label: Needs freon
answerText: Understood. We'll check charge and also look for leaks — want me to schedule service?

label: Recharge refrigerant
answerText: Got it. Recharge requires diagnostics first — I can schedule a tech.

label: Refrigerant leak
answerText: Understood. Leaks need detection and repair — I can schedule a technician.

label: Hissing sound
answerText: Got it. That can indicate a leak — I can schedule a technician today.

label: R410A
answerText: Got it. We can identify refrigerant type and performance — want me to schedule service?

label: R22
answerText: Understood. R-22 systems need a diagnostic to determine the best option — want me to schedule a tech?

label: Coil leak
answerText: Got it. We can confirm with leak detection — I can schedule a technician.

label: Oil stain near unit
answerText: Understood. That can be a leak indicator — I can schedule a tech to inspect.

label: Top off refrigerant
answerText: Got it. We'll verify charge and check for leaks first — want me to schedule service?

label: Duct cleaning
answerText: Sure. We can help with that — I can get you scheduled for an estimate or service.
followUpQuestion: Do you want me to get that on the schedule?

label: Duck cleaning (duct)
answerText: Got it — duct cleaning. I can help get that scheduled.

label: Duct repair
answerText: Understood. Duct issues affect comfort fast — I can schedule a technician to inspect.

label: Duct leak
answerText: Got it. We can inspect for leaks and airflow loss — want me to schedule a visit?

label: Vent cleaning
answerText: Sure. I can help with that — want me to get you on the schedule?

label: Air scrubber
answerText: Got it. We can go over options and install if it's a fit — want me to schedule a visit?

label: Air purifier
answerText: Understood. We can recommend the right system after a quick look — want me to schedule an appointment?

label: UV light
answerText: Got it. UV is a popular option for air quality — want me to schedule a visit to review options?

label: Mold/allergies
answerText: Understood. We can inspect and recommend air quality solutions — want me to schedule a technician?

label: Dust issue
answerText: Got it. That's usually filtration or duct leakage — I can schedule an inspection.

label: Annual tune-up
answerText: Absolutely. Give me one second while I pull up the schedule.
followUpQuestion: Do you want the first available appointment?

label: Maintenance plan visit
answerText: Got it. I can get your plan visit scheduled — let me pull up availability.
followUpQuestion: Do you want the first available appointment?

label: Preventative maintenance
answerText: Perfect. Preventative maintenance is a smart move — let me pull up the schedule.
followUpQuestion: Do you want the first available appointment?

label: Checkup / inspection
answerText: No problem. We can do a full check and make sure everything's running right.
followUpQuestion: Do you want me to schedule that?

label: Schedule service
answerText: Absolutely. Give me one second while I open the schedule.
followUpQuestion: What day works best for you?
